about: I am a junior Computer Science student as St. Mary's University./n I have been passionate about programming since I was first introduced to it in middle school through various /n robotics camps and my participation in the PREP program. /n/n I am focusing on learning game development through out my univeristy studies but welcome all opportunities to learn new skills and technologies. /n It is important to me to stay involved in my community. I am currently the team manager for the St. Mary's Univeristy Esports /n Rocket League team and Vice President of our local computer  science club Infinite Loops./n Through these positions I aim to connect with other students and help cultivate an interest in tech within all curious minds.
